name: Paint Tanks (EsVagy)
description:
Paint Tanks: A game about capturing area and shooting

A 2D tank shooting game where you try to eliminate your opponents while you capture parts of the map. Your opponents can't travel on area captured by you.

The game is about both spreading and shooting: Having a lot of area is great because you can escape from bad situations but shooting is also important as you can't win without eliminating the other players.

There are also power-ups:

  • Bullet speed power-up
  • Bullet recolor area power-up 
  • Reload time power-up 

Power-ups are important as they increase your chance of winning by enabling you for example to recolor 2 cells of area instead of 1 with 1 bullet thus enabling you to spread more quickly than your opponent.

Controls:


MoveFirePlayer 1W, A, S, DE or SPACEPlayer 2ArrowsCTRLPlayer 3T, F, G, HZ or YPlayer 4I, J, K, LO
